slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Red White is played by dropping 3 balls onto a board consisting of red, white, and jackpot squares.

slide-2.title: Placing Bets
content: You can bet on Double Reds, Double Whites, Triple Reds, Triple Whites, Jackpot, and Double Jackpots simultaneously to increase your chances of winning.

slide-3.title: Game Results
content: The 3 balls will land on the Red White board, forming a combination. Bets matching the result will win.
